title: 4 premades
body: last night i was in a game with 4 premades. they started verbally abusing me so i abused them back. i only said two abusive things the whole game. "low life loser" and "stfu". but all 4 of them has been abusing me with very bad words all game long. some were even homophobic. at the end of the game they all 4 of them reported me and less than 15 minutes later i got a chat restriction. now i admit that them verbally abusing me isnt the reason for me to do likewise and i will take the lesson to heart and just mute them in the future. but they abused me like 10x worse than i abused them shouldnt they get punished as well? i mean its just unfair :(

replies.body: Did you report them?  They wont be punnished unless they are reported.
